articles.title: ASML’s high-NA EUV tools clear the runway for next-gen AI chips
articles.summary: The machine that will make tomorrow’s AI chips possible has just been declared ready for mass production–and the clock for the industry’s next leap has officially started. articles.title: Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and OpenAI partner to accelerate federal permitting
articles.summary: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting time by up to 15% and modernize infrastructure reviews.

articles.title: OpenAI Codex and Figma launch seamless code-to-design experience
articles.summary: OpenAI and Figma launch a new Codex integration that connects code and design, enabling teams to move between implementation and the Figma canvas to iterate and ship faster.

articles.title: Finding value with AI and Industry 5.0 transformation
articles.summary: For years, Industry 4.0 transformation has centered on the convergence of intelligent technologies like AI, cloud, the internet of things, robotics, and digital twins. articles.title: The Download: how America lost its lead in the hunt for alien life, and ambitious battery claims
articles.summary: This is today’s edition of The Download, our weekday newsletter that provides a daily dose of what’s going on in the world of technology. articles.title: This company claims a battery breakthrough. Now they need to prove it.

articles.title: Disrupting malicious uses of AI | February 2026
articles.summary: Our latest threat report examines how malicious actors combine AI models with websites and social platforms—and what it means for detection and defense.

articles.title: Nokia and AWS pilot AI automation for real-time 5G network slicing
